EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-03-06 AWS vs Azure.ES-20190205-Invite 1.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: AWS vs Azure
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Are you torn between which is the right cloud feature or service for you, and which cloud provider should you use? AWS or Azure?
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]>
Join the AWS vs Azure <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]> webinar, March 6th at 11 am ET, and find out what key services, capabilities, and differences you'll discover as you look to adopt AWS and Azure. You'll learn how organizations like yours have made decisions between cloud providers and how to choose which cloud is right for you based on your requirements and objectives.
Register now and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. Hope to see you there!
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-vs-azure/]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
